name: Lily (Centennial Game Development Program)
description:
What does Lily's future hold? 

Lily is a visual novel about the relationship between grandchild and grandparent, and balancing attention between yourself and others. 

When a young girl is forced to face a large change, how can you, as her grandfather, help her cope with it? 

Every choice you make matters. Is fulfilling your own goals your top priority? or do you put your family before yourself? 

You decide. ✾

Meet the Team :
